list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a relationship between people or groups based on shared feelings, interests, or experiences.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there was a bond of understanding between them
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: có một sự ràng buộc giữa họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a connection between two surfaces or objects that have been joined together, especially by means of an adhesive substance, heat, or pressure.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there was no effective bond between the concrete and the steel
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Không có liên kết hiệu quả giữa bê tông và thép

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a pattern in which bricks are laid in order to ensure the strength of the resulting structure.
join or be joined securely to something else, especially by means of an adhesive substance, heat, or pressure.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: press the material to bond the layers together
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nhấn vật liệu để liên kết các lớp với nhau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: join or be joined by a chemical bond.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: neutral molecules bond to the central atom
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Phân tử trung tính liên kết với nguyên tử trung tâm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: lay (bricks) in an overlapping pattern so as to form a strong structure.
